post.author: 코스카
post.content:
Working opportunities in Bahamas

CIS is looking for 2 programmer/analyst in Toronto or Nassau
Contract for 1 - 3 years

Experienced with
VB 6.0, SQL Server, SQL(Stored Procedure), Crystal Report, Custom OCX:DLL, VSS

Nice to have
DB2/AS400

Send your resume to

cis@batelnet.bs
post.title: Jobs Opp from djeong@rogers.com
